mapper.select: SELECT count(`time`) num,date_format(`time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') alerttime FROM middleware_platform.alert_record WHERE `time` >= #{beginTime} AND `time` <= #{endTime} AND `level` = #{level} AND `cluster_id` != "" AND `namespace` != "" AND `name` != "" AND lay = "service" GROUP BY alerttime ORDER BY `time` DESC;
